articles.title: WHO warns of 236,000 more COVID deaths in Europe by December - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: High transmission rates across the continent ‘deeply worrying, particularly in the light of low vaccination’, WHO says.

articles.title: Coronavirus booster shots 'not a luxury', WHO Europe head says - The Star Online
articles.description: COPENHAGEN (Reuters) -A third-dose booster shot of the COVID-19 vaccination is a way to keep the most vulnerable safe and "not a luxury", the World Health Organization said on Monday.
